plot outline: Shiva a Maratha and follower of Shivaji Maharaj falls in love with Muslim girl Sara in his college.His friend Isha also likes him but helps to unite the two lovers When Sara's family finds about it they take her away from college.Shiva doesn't loose hope and with help of his friend Irfan tries to win her love.
title: Lagna Mubarak
plot: A young man and a woman fall in love with each other and go through a series of obstacles while trying to maintain their relationship.

Shiva a Maratha and follower of Shivaji Maharaj falls in love with Muslim girl Sara in his college.His friend Isha also likes him but helps to unite the two lovers When Sara's family finds about it they take her away from college.Shiva doesn't loose hope and with help of his friend Irfan tries to win her love.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
